name: Kuat Drive Yards
Lore: 'Company that produces current generation of Star Destoryers, as well as Nebulon-B Frigates. Ship yards are extremely well defended.',
Text: 'Deploy on Kuat system. All your Imperial-class Star Destroyers are immune to attrition < 4. Once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one Imperial-class Star Destroyer here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter while you occupy Kuat.)',
